Topic.Title: put the Quest Program on my website

Posts.EditableText:
Am I allowed to put the Quest program on my website so people can download the program.  I be making my games avaliable as a downloaded file only so people can play on their computers but as i know in order to play the games you need the Quest software.

Or do i have to link this site for them to download the software?
Posts.HTML:
Am I allowed to put the Quest program on my website so people can download the program. I be making my games avaliable as a downloaded file only so people can play on their computers but as i know in order to play the games you need the Quest software.

Or do i have to link this site for them to download the software?

Posts.EditableText: Personally I would embed the link to your site that's brings directly to download, bit that's just me. Im not sure about what you're asking thou sorry.
Posts.HTML: Personally I would embed the link to your site that's brings directly to download, bit that's just me. Im not sure about what you're asking thou sorry.

Posts.EditableText:
ok, i was just asking if it's ok if I put the program on my website as a download so people can download the program from my site as my games will be downloadable only and will need this Quest program in order for them to play the game.

But if this is not allowed i will link this site for them to download Quest.
Posts.HTML:
ok, i was just asking if it's ok if I put the program on my website as a download so people can download the program from my site as my games will be downloadable only and will need this Quest program in order for them to play the game.

But if this is not allowed i will link this site for them to download Quest.

Posts.EditableText: Yes you can upload Quest to your own website. The open source licence gives you permission to copy it with no restrictions.
Posts.HTML: Yes you can upload Quest to your own website. The open source licence gives you permission to copy it with no restrictions.
